Package MDP

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MDP.Action
    Represents an action over the state space of the MDP
    MDP.Feature
    Represents a feature (real valued function over the state space of the MDP)
    MDP.Measure
    Represents a measure over the state space of the MDP
    MDP.Measure.Bset  
    MDP.State
    Represents a state in the MDP
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GridMDP
    Class implementing a Grid World Environment (GWE)
    MDP
    Abstract class to be used as an interface for writing Markov Decision Models
    PuddleMDP
    Class implementing a Puddle Environment (PUDE)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GridMDP.GridType
    Type of grid: only used by the constructor
